txt.en: 'You return once more. Marvels stacked upon marvels. And Etterfang is finally slain? Then Borin's quest is at long last done. I wonder what will become of this Stave the Zhélruka found. I wonder if their fabled lost citadel is quite as near as they hope. Ah, but only time will tell.'
Complete the Caverns of Thrumfall Instance
You should talk to Agátur in Skarháld.
Deep within Stormwall lies a fiery secret, slumbering in the shadows.
Complete the Caverns of Thrumfall Instance.\n\nThe Caverns of Thrumfall Instance can be found in the Instance Finder panel on the Specific tab under Non-Scaling Instance - Grey Mountains.
'You will go? Good. See that the world is rid of Etterfang at last.'

'Hórin vouches for Drengur. He is not a dwarf known to spin tales. This means that Etterfang yet lives. The Zhélruka are already organizing for an attack. You should join them. They are not as well prepared for such a fight as you are, [placeholder].'
